summary: "Interstellar" is a 2014 science fiction movie about a group of astronauts searching for a new home for humans. Directed by Christopher Nolan, it's set in a future where Earth is dying. The team travels through a wormhole near Saturn, using a mix of practical and digital effects. The film was praised for its visuals and science, winning an Oscar for Best Visual Effects. It made over $681 million worldwide.
title: Interstellar (film)
